price: 24. Zij zullen daar niets koels proeven, noch iets drinken.
arabic: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡدٗا وَلَا شَرَابًا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā bardan walā sharāban
